mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_REGDATE, PAYMENT_ROLE, PAYMENT_USER_ID, PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_COIN_COUNT, PAYMENT_UID FROM Payment WHERE PAYMENT_NO = #{paymentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT(PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_REGDATE, PAYMENT_ROLE, PAYMENT_USER_ID, PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_COIN_COUNT, PAYMENT_UID) VALUES(#{paymentNo}, now(), '1', #{paymentUserId.userId}, #{paymentPrice}, #{paymentCoinCount}, #{paymentUid})
mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_NO , PAYMENT_USER_ID , PAYMENT_REGDATE , PAYMENT_PRICE , PAYMENT_COIN_COUNT FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_USER_ID = #{paymentUserId.userId}

SELECT PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_REGDATE, PAYMENT_ROLE, PAYMENT_USER_ID , PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_COIN_COUNT FROM PAYMENT ORDER BY
PAYMENT_PRICE ASC PAYMENT_PRICE DESC PAYMENT_PRICE ASC PAYMENT_PRICE DESC PAYMENT_REGDATE DESC
select sum(payment_price) AS payment_price, date_format(payment_regdate, '%c') AS date from payment group by date order by 2

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(payment_regdate, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(payment_regdate)-1) DAY), '%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(payment_regdate, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`payment_regdate`)-7) DAY), '%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(payment_regdate, '%Y%U') AS date, sum(payment_price) AS payment_price FROM payment GROUP BY date order by date
select sum(payment_price) AS payment_price, payment_regdate AS date from payment group by date order by date

SELECT DATE(payment_regdate) AS date, sum(payment_price) As payment_price FROM payment WHERE DATE(payment_regdate) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(payment_regdate) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDay}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date order by date
